Hello everyone, and today I will annotate a game I finished recently. 


White starts with e4
I choose the open games.

the petrov's defence. Most opponents played Nxe5, and after d6, they could play 4.Nf3 or 4.Nxf7!?
After 4.Nf3 Nxe4, the most common move is Nc3. The move I hated to see was the very dull 5.d4.

the petrov's defence. Most opponents played Nxe5, and after d6, they could play 4.Nf3 or 4.Nxf7!?
After 4.Nf3 Nxe4, the most common move is Nc3. The move I hated to see was the very dull 5.d4.
Petrov 3 knights. 3...Bb4 is supposed to be really OK for black. I choose the 4 knights game.
A perfectly reasonable move, but I don't like it because black can play 4...Nxe4 with equality.
